mapper.insert: insert into WeeklyWeather(WeekWeatherId, AddressId, Min, Max, WeatherCode, DDay) values (WeekWeatherId_SEQ.nextval, ${addressId}, ${min}, ${max}, ${weatherCode}, ${dDay})
mapper.select: select * from WeeklyWeather where AddressId=${addressId} order by DDay asc
select * from WeeklyWeather where AddressId=${addressId} and dDay=${dDay}
